description.diamond-pearl:
The user tackles the
foe with a high-speed
spin. The slower the
user, the greater
the damage.

The user tackles the
foe with a high-speed
spin. The slower the
user, the greater
the damage.

The user tackles the
foe with a high-speed
spin. The slower the
user, the greater
the damage.

The user tackles the target with a
high-speed spin. The slower the
user, the greater the damage.
description.black-2-white-2:
The user tackles the target with a
high-speed spin. The slower the

description.x-y:
The user tackles the target with a high-speed
spin. The slower the user compared to the
target, the greater the move’s power.

The user tackles the target with a high-speed
spin. The slower the user compared to the
target, the greater the move’s power.
description.sun-moon:
The user tackles the target with a high-speed spin.
The slower the user compared to the target, the
greater the move’s power.
description.ultra-sun-ultra-moon:
The user tackles the target with a high-speed spin.
The slower the user compared to the target, the
greater the move’s power.
description.lets-go-pikachu-lets-go-eevee:
The user tackles the target with a high-speed spin.
The slower the user compared to the target, the
greater the move’s power.
description.sword-shield:
The user tackles the target with a high-speed spin.
The slower the user compared to the target, the
greater the move’s power.

effect.full: Inflicts regular damage.  Power increases with the target's current Speed compared to the user, given by `1 + 25 * target Speed / user Speed`, capped at 150.
effect.shortEffect: Power raises when the user has lower Speed, up to a maximum of 150.
